          <title>
            <string language="en">Woodland clear-felling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">WaldlandFreiholzschlag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Clair-abattage de régfion boisée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desobstruído-clear-felling da floresta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Libero-abbattimento del terreno boscoso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δασόβια σαφής-κατάρριψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Claro-tala del arbolado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that clear-felling of woodland will result in the disruption of water and nutrient cycles. The growth of healthy trees will be less likely in that area due to soil and nutrient losses.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cutting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">erosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nutrient cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trees</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">woodlands</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß 
Freiholzschlag des Waldlandes die Unterbrechung der Wasser- und 
Nährstoffschleifen ergibt. Das Wachstum der gesunden Bäume ist
in diesem Bereich wegen der Boden- und Nährstoffverluste weniger 
wahrscheinlich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre que le clair-abattage de la
régfion boisée aura comme conséquence l'interruption des cycles de 
l'eau et d'éléments nutritifs. La croissance des arbres sains 
sera moins probable dans cette zone due aux pertes de sol et 
d'éléments nutritifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que o 
desobstruído-clear-felling da floresta resultará no rompimento de 
ciclos da água e do nutriente. O crescimento de árvores 
saudáveis será mais menos provável nessa área  devido às perdas 
do solo e do nutriente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che l'libero-abbattimento 
del terreno boscoso provocherà la rottura dei cicli degli elementi 
nutritivi e dell'acqua. Lo sviluppo degli alberi sani sarà meno
probabile in quella zona dovuto le perdite degli elementi nutritivi e 
del terreno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι η σαφής-κατάρριψη
της δασώδους περιοχής θα οδηγήσει στη διάσπαση του ύδατος και των
θρεπτικών κύκλων. Η αύξηση των υγιών δέντρων θα είναι 
λιγότερο πιθανή σε εκείνη την περιοχή λόγω στο χώμα και τις 
θρεπτικές απώλειες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que la claro-tala del 
arbolado dará lugar a la interrupción de los ciclos del agua y del 
alimento. El crecimiento de árboles sanos será menos probable 
en esa área  debido a las pérdidas del suelo y del alimento.</string>
          </description>
